Job Title: Powder Coater / Painter

Location: Alabama, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Art/Creative, Design, Information Technology

Description:
Are you seeking a career journey filled with purpose and growth opportunities? Join Advantage Resourcing and our esteemed partner company as the newest Powder Coater / Painter, where automotive testing technology has been our passion for over a century. We're not just about crafting exceptional vehicles; we prioritize our planet, communities, and our dedicated team members.

Pay Rate: $14/hr.

Schedule: Monday to Thursday, 6:00 am to 4:00 pm

As a Powder Coater / Painter, you'll be a crucial part of our mission. We're in search of motivated individuals to join our team and contribute to something greater. With operations spanning across 150 countries, we offer a global platform for your career advancement.

Responsibilities:

Prepare parts for coating, including loading and unloadingOperate coating equipment and perform light equipment maintenanceUtilize forklift as requiredAdhere to production schedules and maintain inventory recordsEnsure a clean and efficient work environment


Qualifications:

Minimum one year of experience in powder coating


We appreciate your dedication, and we offer uplifting benefits as a token of our gratitude for your hard work. Enjoy weekly paydays via direct deposit or pay card, along with support from a dedicated local team committed to your success. Benefit from employee discounts, referral bonuses, and comprehensive medical, dental, vision, and 401K options tailored to your needs and those of your family.

Ready to showcase your talent and make a difference? Apply now and join Advantage Resourcing for this exceptional career opportunity. We're excited to connect with you soon!

After you have applied, download our Staffmark Group WorkNOW App to receive real-time job offers and apply for additional opportunities. You can download it from the App Store or get it on Google Play. 

About Advantage Resourcing

Advantage Resourcing is committed to providing equal employment opportunity for all persons regardless of race, color, religion (including religious dress and grooming practices), sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital status, national origin, ancestry, citizenship status, pregnancy, medical condition, genetic information, mental and physical disability, political affiliation, union membership, status as a parent, military or veteran status or other non-merit based factors. We will provide reasonable accommodations throughout the application, interviewing and employment process. If you require a reasonable accommodation, contact us. Advantage Resourcing is an E-Verify employer. This policy is applicable to all phases of the employment relationship, including hiring, transfers, promotions, training, terminations, working conditions, compensation, benefits, and other terms and conditions of employment.

All employees are directed to familiarize themselves with this policy and to act in accordance with it. All decisions with respect to employment matters and other phases of employer-temporary employee relationships will be in keeping with this policy and in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
